name: Suspicious Autorun Registry Modified via WMI
description: Detects suspicious activity where the WMIC process is used to create an autorun registry entry via reg.exe, which is often indicative of persistence mechanisms employed by malware.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)

detection.condition: all of selection_execution_* and (selection_suspicious_paths_1 or (all of selection_suspicious_paths_user_*))

falsepositives: Legitimate administrative activity or software installations
